com.philips.pins.shinelib

Interface SHNDevice.DiscoveryListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SHNDevice

    public static interface SHNDevice.DiscoveryListener
    Interface that provides updates on Services and Characteristics discovered on the SHNDevice.

    • Method Summary
